senses.definition: to make somebody feel great pain or unhappiness, especially so that they make a sound or cry

examples.x: His words wrenched a sob from her.
a wrenching experience
Her words wrenched at my heart.

senses.definition: a tropical disease that makes the skin turn yellow and often causes death
a disease that can be spread from animals to humans

examples.x: The disease emerged as a zoonosis but then mutated into a human-only strain.

senses.definition: used to describe a disease that can be spread from animals to humans

examples.x: Influenza is just one of many zoonotic diseases that pose a serious risk to human health.
